metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19762 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is a heap-based buffer overflow at fromsixel.c (function: image_buffer_resize) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
